attributes.action: Every worker should be entitled to 6 weeks annual leave exclusive of Bank holidays
attributes.additional_details: I want the Government to enforce legislation to ensure that all employees are entitled to a minimum of 6 weeks annual leave per year, and it should be enforced that this is exclusive of bank holidays.  This is only fair,. as 6 weeks of a year isn't a lot to give to loyal, hard working employees.  Please support justice for workers.
